text: If you're talking about Energy Breaker, there's nothing yet. The guy is working on other projects too, so yeah. As for Mystic Ark, no patch either, we can only wait. I'm not even sure Magic Destiny resumed his work on the game.
author: Huxley

text:
I'm definately gonna check out the Mother 3 patch later on, since I was following the progress on Tomato's site.

Maybe to celebrate the translation, you'll put a song up from it?
author: Sephiko

text: It is.  Has a great level up system.  That and attacks worth seeing.  Such as one that has angels show up, then demons sing, and finally boom.  One of the graphically best attacks on a 16-bit RPG.
author: Neko Vermillion

text:
Ugh Mystic Ark. I really wish they'd finish it. But if Magic Destiny is back and working, maybe we'll finally see a complete translation!

But if there's a game that interests me more than any other, it's Energy Breaker. A little SRPG made by the same team that made Lufia 2. Last update on the translation was made in August though, but he was nearly done.
author: Huxley

text: Yep indeed. I started Lennus 2, it's a weird game, but I like it a lot. Worth playing.
author: Huxley

text: Sounds kind of sad.
author: PAVGN

text:
Great week translation-wise! After Mother 3, Paladin's Quest 2(Lennus 2) has also been translated to english!
I personally really liked PQ, I think it has a unique charm but it's also because I played this game during a memorable time as a kid.
author: SupraDarky
